frontmatter.title: Academic writing on steroids
frontmatter.description: my course on advanced writing digital tools and a landing page for it

projectData.task: To develop and launch a profitable course on academic writing for Russian audience with minimal expenses
projectData.whyExists: Through the 3 years of my PhD studies, I have had issues with systematizing the literature I've read and putting it into the context. I researched the topic and gradually developed a system which works for me. After a year of preliminary research with problem interviews, questionnaires among my students and colleagues alike, I developed a course and decided to design and develop a landing page as well, as I wanted granular control (and free hosting)

process.title: Demand test
process.caption: After formulating the product concept, I wanted to validate the idea, so I conducted several online surveys and a couple of problem interviews, mostly amongst my students. The result was that I shifted my target audience from BA and MA humanities students to PhDs, early career professors and knowledge work professionals

process.title: Design and USP formulation
process.caption: At this stage I wanted to create a landing page with a payment system to check whether any actual human being would pay for my course. As the course revolves around text, I decided to base the page design on typography. My fellow product marketing manager helped me to formulate and settle on the unique selling propositions of the course

process.title: Coding
process.caption: I used Gatsby, Styled Components and Netlify Functions to code the page. Why I chose this tech stack, read below

process.title: Promotion
process.caption: My fellow PMM helped to find relevant Telegram channels to discuss a post about the course. In addition, I made a Facebook post and asked couple of friend to repost. It led to 30+ leads and eventually to 13 payments

process.title: Curriculum development
process.caption: I wrote the plan and structured the things I wanted to teach into presentation. The format was synchronous and practice oriented

process.title: Feedback interviews
process.caption: Conducting interviews to gather the participant feedback to iterate the course content and format and continue the product discovery phase
